other_tests.findings: Documents multiple episodes of NSVT lasting as long as 26 beats; records 4665 premature ventricular contractions.
Demonstrates normal sinus rhythm, incomplete right bundle branch block, and multiple T-wave abnormalities.
Shows normal left ventricular function and chamber size; normal right ventricular function with its size at the upper limits of normal; no valvular or pericardial abnormalities.
Reveals normal coronary arteries and normal left ventricular ejection fraction of >65%; neither a biopsy nor a right ventriculogram was performed.

Shows borderline dilated left ventricle with normal LV mass and systolic function; right ventricle is dilated with normal global right ventricular systolic function and the distal one-third is akinetic; subendocardial delayed enhancement of the distal one-third of the right ventricle.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Burden of VE worsens; switching medications leads to a significant decrease in VE.
